in_brief: Dr. V. Suresh kumar currently holds the position of Associate Professor, Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology, India. He is working in this institution since 2007. He received his PhD in Mathematics, thesis title "Design and Analysis of Security Protocols using Formal Methods" from Anna University. His research interest includes Electronic voting protocol, Electronic payment protocol, Authentication and key establishment protocols for RFID and WSN. His research publications include many peer reviewed International Journals and conference papers. He has been a reviewer in “IEEE Systems Journal”, “IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics”, “IEEE Transactions on  Dependable  and  Secure  Computing”, “IEEE Transactions on Sustainable Computing “, “IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics”, “IEEE Sensors Journal”, “ACM Transactions on Internet Technology”,  “Information Security Journal” Wiley publisher, “IET Communications”, “International Journal of Communication Systems” Wiley publisher, “Security and Privacy” Wiley publisher and “IEEE Access”, and in several Conferences for proceedings. He is a recognized supervisor (guide) in Anna University for PhD/MS research scholars ( Ref. No. 3170022).
